mapper.select: select * from boards where board_num is not null
select b.user_email, u.user_nick, b.board_num, b.board_type, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_date, b.board_view, b.board_pic from boards b, users u where b.user_email = u.user_email
mapper.update: update boards set board_title = #{board_title}, board_type=#{board_type}, board_content=#{board_content} where board_num=#{board_num}
